citations.title: Rivian and Volkswagen Group Announce Plans for Joint
citations.summary: Rivian and Volkswagen Group have announced a partnership aimed at enhancing software development for both companies, leveraging Rivian's zonal hardware design and integrated technology platform as a foundation for future software-defined vehicle (SDV) advancements. This collaboration is expected to combine their strengths, reduce vehicle costs through increased scale, and accelerate global innovation. Rivian, known for its electric vehicles and accessories, focuses on advancing zero-emission transportation and energy solutions.

citations.title: Rivian Releases First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
citations.summary: Rivian has made significant advancements in the development of its R2 model, initiating design validation builds on its prototype line with majority production tooling. The company's 1.1 million sq. ft. manufacturing expansion in Normal, Illinois is on schedule, with R2 production expected to commence in the first half of 2026. In the first quarter of 2025, Rivian produced 14,611 vehicles and delivered 8,640, aligning with management's guidance.

citations.title: Rivian Releases Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
citations.summary: Rivian's preparations for the R2 launch are on schedule, with the 1.1 million square foot expansion of its Normal, Illinois plant nearing completion and production tooling installation underway. The company plans to commission the new R2 production line in Q3 2025 to validate equipment and processes, while R2 design validation builds are currently being produced on a pilot line in California. Additionally, Rivian is focusing on its autonomy platform and aims to share more details about its roadmap later this year.

citations.title: Rivian Holds Kickoff Ceremony for Georgia Plant, ...
citations.summary: Rivian held a groundbreaking ceremony for its new manufacturing plant in Social Circle, Georgia, attended by state officials, with construction set to begin in 2026. The facility represents a multi-billion dollar investment, expected to create 7,500 jobs by 2030, including 2,000 construction positions. Production of Rivian's next-generation electric vehicles, specifically the midsize R2 SUV and R3 crossover, is anticipated to start in 2028.

citations.title: Rivian launches world's first Electric Adventure Vehicles
citations.summary: Rivian's R1T and R1S electric vehicles are built on a skateboard platform that integrates the battery pack, drive units, suspension, braking, and thermal systems beneath the wheel height, maximizing interior space. The vehicles feature a robust battery module designed for challenging conditions, with advanced cooling and underbody protection, while adaptive control algorithms optimize battery management based on driver behavior. Rivian plans to offer three battery sizes, including 180 kWh and 135 kWh options.

citations.title: Rivian launches first Electric Adventure Vehicle with debut ...
citations.summary: Rivian's Electric Adventure Vehicle features a robust battery module designed for extreme conditions, equipped with underbody protection and an advanced cooling system. The vehicle utilizes adaptive control algorithms for optimized battery management, with three battery sizes planned, including 180 kWh and 135 kWh options. Built on a skateboard platform, the vehicle allows for efficient packaging of components and supports fast charging at rates up to 160 kW, enabling approximately 200 miles of range in just 30 minutes.
